column2: A short description of what you want to find out in the experiment
What you think will happen in the experiment, and the reason for thinking that
A list of the things you need to do the experiment
A list of the things you did in the experiment that somone else can use to do the experiment again
The things you observed in the experiment
Explain your results and any problems that you had doing the experiment
The answer to the things you wanted to find out in the “aim”
